name: Head Soccer!
description: Read (Not using instant win kickoffs makes it more fun) I'm tired of people commenting that USA and Canada are not in this. ONLY COUNTRIES THAT QUALIFIED FOR THE WORLD CUP 2018 ARE IN THIS GAME -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Player One - Arrow Keys Player Two (2p) - WASD -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- 2805 Blocks Might be my last game :( -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Features World Cup, 2 Player, Training and Achievements -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Win 2 of your first 3 matches to qualify for knockout -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Different bot countries have different difficulties: 3 star (hard): Brazil, Germany, Spain, France, England, Portugal, Columbia, Argentina, Belgium, Uruguay, Croatia 2 star (medium): Russia, Poland, Mexico, Denmark, Switzerland, Sweden, Nigeria, Egypt, Senegal, Serbia, Japan 1 star (easy): Morocco, Peru, Iceland, Australia, Costa Rica, Tunisia, Iran, Saudi Arabia, Panama, South Korea -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
